wikipedia_page.main: James McGrahan (3 March 1898 – after 1948), also known as Jimmy McGrahan or McGraham, was an English footballer who made 85 appearances in the Football League playing for Lincoln City (in two spells) and Wigan Borough. He played as a wing half or centre half.

response: Ward was first choice as Lincoln City's left back when the Football League resumed after the war. He made 38 league appearances in 1919–20 as they finished 21st in the Second Division and failed to be re-elected. He helped Lincoln win the 1920–21 Midland League title and return to the Football League as founder members of its Third Division North, and made a further 55 league appearances before the club's financial difficulties meant he and wing half James McGrahan were sold to Wigan Borough in 1922.
